name: Draw a Line: Tricky Brain Test
name_original: Draw a Line: Tricky Brain Test
description:
Draw a Line: Tricky Brain Test is a puzzle drawing game and it is also a great way to improve your imagination and creativity while having fun.

You need to find the missing part and draw it without any drawing skills required! Let's see how many levels will you get through?

So, what are you waiting for? Good Luck!
